Files | Data Structures | Typedefs | Enumerations | Functions
XMC
CSL ARCH Module » C66x

Files

file  dsp_xmc.h
 This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of Extended Memory Controller (XMC) in the C66x DSP subsytems. This also include related macro definitions. All APIs should be called with interrupts disabled to ensure coherency.

  DSPXMC_ALLOW_UR = XMPAXL_UR_MASK, DSPXMC_ALLOW_UW = XMPAXL_UW_MASK, DSPXMC_ALLOW_UX = XMPAXL_UX_MASK, DSPXMC_ALLOW_SR = XMPAXL_SR_MASK,

"Physical" refers only to address map at C66x CorePac boundary and does not account translation done by any memory controller outside the DSP. More...

Detailed Description

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum dspxmcSegSize dspxmcSegSize_t

Enums for Segment Size in XMC configuration.

enum dspxmcSegSize_t

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum dspxmcAccessPerms

Enum to permissions mask for MPAX (memory protection and address extension) registers in XMC.

Enumerator
DSPXMC_ALLOW_UR 

Enable bit User mode Read access

DSPXMC_ALLOW_UW 

Enable bit User mode Write access

DSPXMC_ALLOW_UX 

Enable bit User mode Execute access

DSPXMC_ALLOW_SR 

Enable bit Supervisor mode Read access

DSPXMC_ALLOW_SW 

Enable bit Supervisor mode Write access

DSPXMC_ALLOW_SX 

Enable bit Supervisor mode Execute access

enum dspxmcSegSize

Enums for Segment Size in XMC configuration.

enum dspxmcSegSize_t

Clear the fault registers for location and status in the XMC.

Returns

int32_t DSPXMCSetMPAXSegment ( uint32_t  baseAddress,
uint32_t  segmentId,
uint32_t  segmentSize,
uint32_t  inpBAddress,
uint32_t  repAddressL,
uint32_t  repAddressH,
uint32_t  permsFieldVal 
)

Configure the specified MPAX segment Input address (inpBAddress - 32bit) is the virtual address used by the DSP. Replacement address (repAddressH/L - 36bit) is the physical address to which the virtual address maps to. "Physical" refers only to address map at C66x CorePac boundary and does not account translation done by any memory controller outside the DSP.

Parameters
baseAddressBase Address of the XMC instance (SOC_DSP_XMC_CTRL_BASE)
segmentIdSegment ID to use - 16 segments are supported. Any value greater than 15 will be considered as 15.
segmentSizeUse enum dspxmcSegSize_t
inpBAddress32bit input address as per C66x native address space. Should be aligned to segmentSize.
repAddressLLower 32bits of replacement address (36bit) Should be aligned to segmentSize. For address 0x1_2345_6789, this value must be 0x2345_6789.
repAddressHUpper 4bits of replacement address (36bit) For address 0x1_2345_6789, this value must be 0x1. In most cases, this will be 0x0.
permsFieldValBitfield specifying access rights to the segment Create this by bit-wise "OR" ing of enums specified in dspxmcAccessPerms_t
Returns
status Success of the window configuration
int32_t DSPXMCSetPrefetchPriority ( uint32_t  baseAddress,
uint32_t  priority 
)

Set prefetch request priority for XMC TBD: Planning to remove - usage information is not clear.

Parameters
baseAddressBase Address of the XMC instance (SOC_DSP_XMC_CTRL_BASE)
priorityPriority from 0(highest) to 7(lowest)
Returns
status Always returns STW_OK
